ModMetaData.name: NO Royalty Music
ModMetaData.author: RedstoneRevolution
ModMetaData.description:
A revival and modification of Saltgin's "Disable Vanilla Music". Saltgin's: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1582710278
This mod removes JUST THE ROYALTY MUSIC from the game.
No more jarring Royalty tracks when you are jammin to the Vanilla soundtrack.
This mod is save-compatible and can be placed any where in the loadorder.
